I think there 's one thing to consider is that home ownership in America is the way that wealth gets accumulated .
It 's the primary means by which we accumulate wealth .

So if that mechanism for this generation to accumulate wealth is n't working the way it has in the past , I think it opens questions about how we treat renters and their prospects for accumulating wealth over the long - term so that we do n't increase this divide between wealth accumulation , not only by income group , but now - but by generation .
